title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Ecological Dynamics-Based Simulator for Designing Athlete Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain training design principles based on ecological dynamics theory with over 80% accuracy
Learners can design kicking technique training programs by manipulating constraints (physical pressure, goal types, etc.) in VR simulation environments
Learners can diagnose training design effectiveness with over 75% confidence by analyzing formative assessment data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
